column2: [From.GetDynName] adopted a feudal system in [From.GetHerHis] domains, abandoning the old tribal ways.
[From.GetDynName] adopted an Iqta system in [From.GetHerHis] domains, abandoning the old tribal ways.
[From.GetDynName] settled as a tribe in [From.GetHerHis] domains, leaving their old nomad life behind them.
On [GetDateText] word reached us that Africa has been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
On [GetDateText] word reached us that Asia minor has been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
[Root.GetTitledNameWithNick] narrowly escaped imprisonment by [From.GetTitledNameWithNick] and was forced to raise [Root.GetHerHis] flag in rebellion.
A terrible scourge was unleashed upon [first_aztec_invasion_target.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetName] as the hordes of the Aztec Emperor arrived from beyond the sea to wreak havoc and destruction.

Strangers in strange ships landed in the [first_aztec_invasion_target.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] county of [first_aztec_invasion_target.GetName], bringing rise to much worry and rumours across the lands.
[Root.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] ascended to the Kshatriya caste, claiming new prestige for [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty among [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers.

[Root.GetTitledName] became a [Root.GetLordLady] in the new Crusader State. [Root.GetSheHeCap] was granted a copy of the dynasty chronicles by [From.GetTitledName] to bring with [Root.GetHerHim] to the new state.

[Root.GetTitledName] became ruler of the new Crusader State, [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [Root.GetSheHeCap] was granted a copy of the dynasty chronicles by [From.GetTitledName] to bring with [Root.GetHerHim] to the new Kingdom.

[Root.GetFirstName], the firstborn [Root.GetSonDaughter], was born to [Root.Mother.GetTitledName].
On [GetDateText] the Plague arrived at our borders. May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] protect us.
[Root.GetTitledName] successfully led [Root.GetHerHis] armies, taking [From.GetName] from the enemy.
It became known that [Root.GetTitledName] now honored the Mahayana tradition.

The [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] declared by [From.GetDynName] ended in defeat as the armies failed to conquer [Root.GetName].
The [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] ended as the [From.Religion.GetName] no longer have a Religious Head.
The [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] declared by [From.RelHead.GetDynName] ended with the successful conquest of [Root.GetName] from the [New.Religion.GetName]s.

The [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] declared by [From.RelHead.GetDynName] ended with the successful conquest of [Root.GetName] from the [New.Religion.GetName]s. [From.GetDynName] became the new [From.GetLordLady] of the conquered lands.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] divorced [Root.GetTitledName].
On [GetDateText] word reached us that eastern Europe has been widely Depopulated by the dreaded Plague.
[From.Owner.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] lost [From.GetName] to the forces of [Root.TopLiege.GetTitledName].
[Root.GetTitledNameWithNick] tried but failed to imprison [From.GetTitledNameWithNick], causing [From.GetHerHim] to come out in open rebellion.
A dragon was seen in the county of [target_province.GetName].
A giant destroyed several villages in [target_province.GetName], but then disappeared without trace.
Strange and wonderful serpents were seen in [target_province.GetName].
Several people in [target_province.Capital.GetName] spoke of seeing strange shapes dancing on the moon.
A ten feet tall woman was crucified in the county of [target_province.GetName].
Villagers saw blood raining from the sky in the county of [target_province.GetName].
A strange plague killed thousands of wild rabbits in the county of [target_province.GetName].
The earth shook for three days in [target_province.GetName], killing two hundred peasants and a priest.
A river flooded parts of [target_province.GetName] in the spring.
People in [target_province.GetName] claimed to have seen two suns at the same time.
A goat with three heads was born in [target_province.GetName].
Tens of thousands of crows birds invaded [target_province.GetName] just before the harvest, causing much damage to the farmers's fields.
An uncommonly great number of children were born this year in [target_province.GetName].
In [target_province.GetName], the people celebrated the benevolent rule of [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
A star fell from the sky in [target_province.GetName], killing three cows.
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] saw an unusually bountiful harvest this year.

A book containing the lost [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName] was acquired and on this date a great meeting of scholars confirmed its authenticity. In those times, [wonder_province.GetName] was known as a place of culture, visited by scholars from afar.
[Root.GetDynName] was crowned Holy Roman Emperor by [Root.RelHead.GetBestName] on [GetDateText], thus restoring the Roman Empire in the West.
[From.GetDynName] founded a merchant republic in [From.GetHerHis] domains, abandoning the old tribal ways.
[Root.GetDynName] displayed [Root.GetHerHis] great power by founding the new [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
[Root.GetTitledName] declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName], wherein all faithful [Root.Religion.GetName]s were called to help conquer [From.GetName] from the [New.Religion.GetName]s.

As a distinguished leader of [From.Society.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] invited all members to partake in a Grand Debate.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] held a grand tournament, inviting all the great lords and knights of the realm.
